mobiles.name: master vampire
mobiles.long_description: A master vampire is here, looking at his next meal.
mobiles.description: He is hideous, and looks very powerful to boot. RUN AWAY!!!

mobiles.name: Monsignor Ameliano
mobiles.long_description: Monsignor Ameliano is here, looking very powerful.
mobiles.description:
If you ask him nicely, he can give you a stake. Or maybe other stuff
later.

mobiles.name: It
mobiles.long_description: It's here!
mobiles.description: It looks back!

mobiles.name: Lurker
mobiles.long_description: The Lurker is here lurking
mobiles.description: Lurker look's back!

mobiles.name: Shadowguardian
mobiles.long_description: The shadowguardian is here guarding
mobiles.description: The shadowguardian look's back at you!

mobiles.name: Enkil
mobiles.long_description: Enkil the first vampire is here.
mobiles.description: Enkil stares at your soul.

mobiles.description: The Neogi looks back

mobiles.name: Cernan

mobiles.description: Cernan glares back

mobiles.description: The Holy Guardian stares past you, as if you were not there.

mobiles.name: statue stone
mobiles.long_description: A huge stone statue of Jevarrel stands here.
mobiles.description:
The statue seems to have some sort of magical aura.
As you look closer, you notice that the eyes glow with
enchanted life !

rooms.name: The starting room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the start room, I hope you've got 
permission to be here!

rooms.name: The Quest starting room
rooms.description: You are standing at the beginning of your quest.

rooms.name: Somewhere within the quest maze
rooms.description:
Your eye's strain to spot something different in the room, but no, it's just
the same as the rest of the rooms you have encountered so far.

rooms.name: A support room
rooms.description:
You find yourself in a circular room with a large pillar standing in the middle
of it. This must be what is holding this entire structure up, better not do
anything that might disturb the pillar.

rooms.name: The exit
rooms.description: All you have to do now is solve the riddle and you are out of here!

rooms.name: The Gods Arena
rooms.description:
You are standing in a massive arena, this place reminds you of a huge Roman
Amphitheatre. The huge oval stretches around you, at the edges you can see
tiers of seats rising into the distance. There are clouds all around which
somehow gives rise to the fact that this place is for the enjoyment of the
Gods.

rooms.name: The East Corridor
rooms.description:
You are at the east of a short corridor. To the east you can see some odd
views, something is definately very strange there. Looking west the corridor
continues. Above you there is a large opening, you can see seats inside.

exits.description: You can see the Gods junction.
You can see the second Gods junction.
You can see the west end of this corridor.
You can see the observation room.

rooms.name: Second Gods Junction
rooms.description:
You are in a hallway, you can see the doorways to the rooms of the
various Gods. There are large stone steps leading upwards here, you spy
a large set of doors at the top, an impressive plate on the door reads:
'Coding Room', it would be wise to wait for an invite before entering.
Looking around you see other deities iconised on the different doors.

exits.description: You can see a vacant room.
You can see the teleportation room.
You can see the corridor.
You can see a vacant room.

rooms.name: Teleportation Room
rooms.description:
Looking around you see fragments of reality. The Gods have designed this
place as an easy way of moving around the world.

exits.description: You can see the Second Gods Junction.

rooms.name: Observation Room
rooms.description:
You stand in a large circular room, the edges are lined with seats.
You have a fabulous panormaic view from here, you can see everything in
the world.

exits.description: You can see a corridor.

rooms.name: The Gods Kitchen
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a comfortable spacious kitchen, work-
surfaces edge the room. Useful gadgets and implements are lying here. Slightly
strange potions sit among more identifiable food. You can see some gardens
from here.

exits.description: You can see some impressive gardens.
You can see a huge hallway.

rooms.name: The God's Garden
rooms.description:
You are walking among massive floral beds and ornamental parks. Huge trees
stretch skywards, the garden continues as far as the eye can see in every
direction.

exits.description: You can see some impressive gardens.
You can see some impressive gardens.
You can see some impressive gardens.
You can see the kitchen.
A trapdoor covers a dark pit.

rooms.name: The God's Hallway
rooms.description:
You are standing in a HUGE hallway. To the north you can see the kitchen,
looking to the south there is a small cosy room. There are steps down
from here, but you cannot see where they lead. There is an impressive
staircase leading up from here.

exits.description: You can see a spacious kitchen.
You can see a comfortable waiting room.
You can see a corridor.
You can see a church.

rooms.name: The Waiting Room of the Gods
rooms.description:
This small room is nicely lined with books and has many large comfy seats
to relax into while you wait.

exits.description: You can see a huge hallway.

rooms.name: The West Corridor
rooms.description:
You are standing at the head of a very impressive staircase at the west
end of a short corridor. You can hear muffled sounds from here, it sounds
like crowds cheering. If you listen carefully you can make out people talking
to the south.

exits.description: You can see a massive amphitheatre.
You can see the east end of this corridor.
You can see the chat room.
You see a huge hallway.

rooms.name: Shrubbery! (The God's Chat room)
rooms.description:
This place is a tip!  Pizza boxes ... Beer cans ... Oh and those huge comfy 
chairs!

exits.description: You can see a door with the icon of Archon on it.
You can see a door with the icon of Valis on it.
You see a corridor.
You can see the door with a blank space on it.
You can see the door with the icon of Joker.
You can see the door with the icon of flames.

rooms.name: The Meeting Hall
rooms.description:
There are several large comfy chairs here.
Hundreds of flat panes of glass show the events
happening all over the realm.

An invisible waiter serves drinks to
the rooms occupants.

exits.description: You can see the Gods juntion.

exits.description: You can see the Gods junction.

rooms.name: Hell
rooms.description: All around you are flames, burning your very soul.

exits.description: You can see the Gods junction.

rooms.name: The Vampire Pit
rooms.description:
You are trapped in a pit, and what is worse ... it's full of rather
tough looking vampires who look slightly unhappy about having their
sleep interrupted by your presence. Ho hum .. time to die!

rooms.description:

rooms.name: Entrance to the Church of Torquemada
rooms.description:
You are standing on in the entrance to one of the most famous of
gathering places for witch hunters world wide. It seems nothing
special, yet it has that vague feeling that you get in churches.
You shiver as you think of all the great vampire hunters that have
passed through these doors.

exits.description: You see a HUGE staircase leading to the heavens.

rooms.name: A dusty hallway
rooms.description:
You walk down a dusty hallway deeper into the church. As you look
around, you see pictures on the walls. Most are depicting scenes
where vampires are cowering from the shimmering Knights of Leopold.

rooms.name: The south side of the church
rooms.description:
You are now in the outer sanctum of the church, there were seats here 
but they have been moved to make room for combat practice and other 
matters. These days the more practical methods of vampire hunting are
important.

rooms.name: The inner sanctum
rooms.description:
Here you stand, in the holiest of holy places. You look around you
in awe. The pillars gleam in the light emitted from here, and your
body tingles with the power stored here. This is the place of miracles.

roomtext_data.output: Monsignor Ameliano says 'Have a good trip!'.
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: Monsignor Ameliano says 'Look at me to see what I do.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: Monsignor Ameliano says 'You'll have to be more specific $n.'
roomtext_data.name: all

roomtext_data.output: Monsignor Ameliano says 'Greetings $n, can I help you?'.
roomtext_data.name: all

rooms.name: The north side of the church
rooms.description:
You are standing in the north side of the church, the view as you look 
south is amazing. You notice an old organ that has probably not
worked for decades, still who likes organ music anyway?

rooms.name: The north conservatory
rooms.description:
This room is amazing, unfortunatly there is nowhere to sit. However
you can gaze out through the glass at the amazing grounds and flower
beds that surround this room. You never see any gardeners, however the
garden is immaculatly kept. God definitly moves in mysterious ways.
However you cannot help feel that this room was meant for more sinister
means, that escape you at the moment.

rooms.name: The east side of the church
rooms.description:
This side of the church is very empty, there are a few objects that
have rotten beyond all form. But hardly any good wood to make stakes
from. You begin to think that it was just left like this for other
hunter to sleep, sounds like a good idea.

rooms.name: The  Chamber
rooms.description: Insert Description here..

rooms.name: A small room for stores
rooms.description:
This room was used for storing food and other stuff that the monks
here needed. It still seems that it is used for storing goods with
more practical uses.

rooms.name: The west side of the church
rooms.description:
This side of the church looks more well used. It's alot warmer so
the more senior vampire hunters hold meetings here or even hold
the odd stake-out here .... there are blood stains on the floor to
prove this.

rooms.name: A small donation room for hunters
rooms.description:
This room holds any more important items that hunter do not need, 
but think others may benefit from. Still if they need simple things
I'm sure they only need ask Monsignor Ameliano.

rooms.name: A special room for certain players
rooms.description:
This is a special safe room that has been made for certain approved players
to use to keep out of trouble. If you are not supposed to be here GO AWAY!
That goes for Deities and Gods too!.

rooms.name: The Vampire Pit

tough looking vampires who look slightly unhappy about having their
sleep interrupted by your presence. Ho hum .. time to die!

rooms.name: The Holy Corridor
rooms.description:
This white marble corridor seems peaceful enough ...
Some sort of magic is illuminating the area, as if
invisible torches lined the walls.

exits.description: An ancient wooden door nearly goes un-noticed.
An ancient wooden door nearly goes un-noticed.

exits.description: An ancient wooden door nearly goes un-noticed.
An ancient wooden door nearly goes un-noticed.

rooms.name: The Halls of Heroes
rooms.description:
What a wonderous place ... white marble halls, linked by
great pillars and archways stretch as far as the eye can
see, and in each hall stands a huge statue of some great
hero or other infamous character, both past and present.
No wonder this place was so well guarded...
